results.name: wordpress/wordpress-5c5c9fb7bb-c8jxz

error.Text: Readiness probe failed: HTTP probe failed with statuscode: 500

results.details:
Error: The readiness probe failed because the application returned a 500 status code, indicating an internal server error.

Solution: 
1. Check application logs for errors.
2. Ensure all dependencies are running.
3. Verify configuration settings.
4. Restart the application.

results.name: wordpress/wordpress

error.Text: Service has not ready endpoints, pods: [Pod/wordpress-5c5c9fb7bb-c8jxz], expected 1

results.details:
Error: The service is not receiving traffic because the pod is not ready.  
Solution: 1. Check pod status with `kubectl get pods`. 2. Inspect pod details using `kubectl describe pod wordpress-5c5c9fb7bb-c8jxz`. 3. Look for readiness probe issues. 4. Fix any configuration errors. 5. Restart the pod if needed.
